Key Match Events: Kylian Mbappé scored a goal on 85 minutes with an assist from Bradley Barcola
Jonathan Clauss fired a scorcher into the top corner on 70 minutes
Randal Kolo Muani scored a soft header on 43 minutes after a sweet center from Mbappé
Pre-Game Insights: Didier Deschamps' men face Austria in their Euro 2024 opener on June 17 in Dusseldorf
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps said of Mbappé, 'Kylian is a great leader and we need him at his best'
Didier Deschamps said, 'He was as good as ever, He did himself proud' about N'Golo Kante's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: France were given hearty support at the match held at Metz, who were relegated from the French top flight in a play off with Saint Etienne, who climbed back into the top flight on Sunday
